par.text: One fluorine compound with wide application is PTFE (Teflon). This compound is resistant to numerous chemical substances and to high temperatures. It is used for making gaskets in the automotive industry, as a non-stick coating for cooking pots and frying pans, etc. From hydrogen fluoride - HF- many other fluorine compounds are prepared. Fluorine is used for glass etching and as a catalyst in the production of high-octane petrol. Uranium(VI) fluoride - U
is applied to the separation of uranium isotopes. Fluo
rine compounds are added to toothpaste and drinking water as a means of prevention of tooth decay.
